titleInfo.title: A Framework for the Acquisition of Multimodal Human-Robot Interaction Data Sets with a Whole-System Perspective

name.namePart: LREC 2012 Workshop on Multimodal Corpora for Machine Learning
Humanoids with auditory and visual abilities in populated spaces

mods.abstract: In this work we present a conceptual framework for the creation of multimodal data sets which combine human-robot interaction with system-level data from the robot platform. The framework is based on the assumption that perception, interaction modeling and system integration need to be treated jointly in order to improve human-robot interaction capabilities of current robots. To demonstrate the feasibility of the framework, we describe how it has been realized for the recording of a data set with the humanoid robot NAO.
